content: this car cup holder coaster crochet pattern adds both functionality and flair to your car s interior making every drive a little more delightful embrace your creative spirit and transform your car s cup holders with this beautiful 3 coaster change up your colors to create lots of different flowers with this one simple pattern *** if you are looking for more design options check out our car cup holder coasters ebook 1 *** ***grab my free printable display tags now here 2 *** check out regina p designs website to find out more get sneak peeks free patterns & sales https //www reginapdesigns com/ if you have any questions about this pattern or any of the other patterns from regina p designs or want to show off your finished projects with our patterns please join our facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/869715883461437/ ***materials *** 100% cotton yarn in 2 colors approx 8 yds g boye 4 25 mm hook scissors needle ***abbreviations us terms *** st = stitch sl= slip_stitch chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet magic_ring = magic_ring copyright 2024 regina p designs all rights reserved all content copyright and other rights reserved by regina p
